price: He said, “Would that I had some strength [to stop you] or could rely on a mighty support!”
arabic: قَالَ لَوۡ أَنَّ لِي بِكُمۡ قُوَّةً أَوۡ ءَاوِيٓ إِلَىٰ رُكۡنٖ شَدِيدٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
